listBibl.bibl: Westermann WL - Kraemer CJ, PCorn, 22, 1926 -- BL VII, 40 on ll. 1-2; BL II.2, 49 on l. 33; BL V, 25 on ll. 68-69 + 111-112; BL IX 63 on line 46.
